data_description.serial_port: The serial port the NAD receiver is connected to.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the NAD receiver.
data_description.port: The port number needed to communicate with the receiver. 53 is the default port for native network connected receivers but if a serial to network bridges like esp-link is used port 23 might need to be selected.

data_description.min_volume: Minimum volume to use with the volume slider.
data_description.max_volume: Maximum volume to use with the volume slider.
